description:
Nature Materials, Published online: 07 August 2024; doi:10.1038/s41563-024-01970-5

Both reusability and sensing capability of biosensors are required but usually challenging to achieve. Here a reusable and highly sensitive epidermal growth factor receptor sensor based on a drug-mediated organic electrochemical transistor is reported.
title: A drug-mediated organic electrochemical transistor for robustly reusable biosensors
